statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM inventory_management WHERE component_quantity > 10;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM inventory_management WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM inventory_management ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_name, component_name, component_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE component_quantity < 5 ORDER BY component_quantity ASC, robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE robot_name = 'Robot A';
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, component_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE component_name = 'Arm';
SELECT robot_name, component_name, component_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE manufacturer = 'Manufacturer X' ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT robot_name, COUNT(component_name) AS total_components FROM inventory_management GROUP BY robot_name HAVING total_components > 5 ORDER BY total_components DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_status FROM SupplyChain WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChain ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_status FROM SupplyChain WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE location LIKE 'Ware%'
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN SupplyChain ON Inventory.product_id = SupplyChain.supplier_id
SELECT product_name, location, supplier_name FROM Inventory JOIN SupplyChain ON Inventory.product_id = SupplyChain.supplier_id ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT id, name, model FROM robots ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, name, model FROM robots WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corporation';
SELECT * FROM parts WHERE category = 'Motor' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT robot_id, part_id, quantity FROM shipments WHERE ship_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Robotics' AND model = 'Model X';
SELECT name, model FROM robots WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Inc' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT r.name, p.name, s.quantity FROM robots r JOIN shipments s ON r.id = s.robot_id JOIN parts p ON s.part_id = p.id WHERE s.quantity > 5 AND p.category = 'Arm';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM parts;
SELECT r.name AS robot_name, p.name AS part_name, s.ship_date AS shipment_date FROM robots r JOIN shipments s ON r.id = s.robot_id JOIN parts p ON s.part_id = p.id ORDER BY s.ship_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, robot_type FROM robots WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_name, production_line_id FROM robots WHERE production_line_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT component_name, cost FROM components WHERE supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, order_date, component_id, quantity, delivery_date FROM orders ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, robot_type FROM robots WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_name, cost FROM components ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT line_name, supervisor_id FROM production_lines WHERE supervisor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE delivery_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM Robots WHERE production_year > 2015;
SELECT assembly_name, quantity_available, last_updated FROM Assemblies ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name ILIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM Parts WHERE unit_price < 100.00 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robots ORDER BY production_year DESC, robot_name ASC;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM Robots WHERE manufacturer = 'Honda';
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM Parts WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT assembly_name, quantity_available FROM Assemblies WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
